law.catch_line: This subtitle does not require the disclosure by a regulated lobbyist of any gift to the regulated l...
law.text:
This subtitle does not require the disclosure by a regulated lobbyist of any gift to the regulated lobbyist's immediate family, if the gift is:
purely personal and private in nature and not related to the regulated lobbyist's lobbying activities; and
from the regulated lobbyist's personal funds and not attributable to any other entity or entities.
